results.deck: Last Remnant is a Square Enix-developed RPG with a new and unique combat system that invites the gamers to an exciting experience.
results.name: The Last Remnant

results.deck: On a post-apocalyptic Earth a catastrophic event forces humans to evolve creating two distinct races, the Echelon and the Sai. With coexistence no longer an option the stage is set for the final conflict.
results.name: Stormrise

results.deck: B.J.  Blazkowicz returns, guns blazing, to stop the Nazis from harnessing the power of an alternate dimension known as the Black Sun.
results.name: Wolfenstein

results.deck: After the death of his brother at the hands of a corrupt Earth government, Alec Mason has no choice but to join the Red Faction terrorist cell and fight to free Mars from Earth oppression.
results.name: Red Faction: Guerrilla

results.deck: Singularity is Raven Software's alternate history shooter, where the player is given the ability of time manipulation.
results.name: Singularity

results.deck: The third entry in the Smash Court series
results.name: Smash Court Tennis 3

results.deck: Play as Postal Dude Jr. for the second time, and continue to cause general mayhem in a new setting, the town of Catharsis, Arizona.
results.name: Postal III

results.deck: An Xbox 360 game that allows players to make their own movie trailers through mini-games using the Xbox Live Vision Cam.
results.name: You're In the Movies

results.deck: "Lips" is a Karaoke game similar to the SingStar franchise. "Lips" comes bundled with two motion-sensing, LED-lit microphones for $69.99 US. In addition to the 40 songs that come on the disc, players can plug in their MP3 player and sing along to their own music.
results.name: Lips

results.deck: Call of Juarez is a Western-themed first person shooter from Polish developer Techland and published by Ubisoft.
results.name: Call of Juarez

results.deck: Conan is an action adventure game that has you slicing and dicing your way through hordes of enemies.
results.name: Conan

results.deck: In a futuristic totalitarian dystopia, a master courier (in a group of renegade "runners") investigates a conspiracy, while outrunning the deadly government military, in this parkour-inspired first-person action game.
results.name: Mirror's Edge

results.deck: TimeSplitters 4 is the latest installment in the TimeSplitters franchise by Crytek UK, formerly Free Radical Design. The project is currently on hold indefinitely.
results.name: TimeSplitters 4

results.deck: Pro Evolution Soccer 6 is a soccer game made by Konami.
results.name: Winning Eleven: Pro Evolution Soccer 2007

results.deck: The MLB 2K series returns for the 2007 season with this installment.
results.name: Major League Baseball 2K7

results.deck: Juiced 2: Hot Import Nights is a racing video game for various platforms.
results.name: Juiced 2: Hot Import Nights

results.deck: The latest and possible the last in the College 2K series. Many improvements are subtle, but the changes and additions to College Hoops 2K8 make it the best game in the series.
results.name: College Hoops 2K8

results.deck: NHL 09 adds major improvements to the franchise, such as the defense skill stick and the highly praised Be A Pro Mode, to make this sports game one of the best of 2008.
results.name: NHL 09

results.deck: Tenchu Z is the eighth game in the Tenchu series. It was released for the Xbox 360.
results.name: Tenchu Z

results.deck: The fourth expansion in the Final Fantasy XI Online series adds new areas along with the ability to go back in time.  Wings of the Goddess also introduces two new jobs to the game.
results.name: Final Fantasy XI Online: Wings of the Goddess

results.deck: Looney Tunes: Acme Arsenal is a third-person action title featuring popular characters from the Looney Tunes featurettes.
results.name: Looney Tunes: Acme Arsenal

results.deck: A compilation of the games in the Raiden Fighters subseries of shooters.
results.name: Raiden Fighters Aces

results.deck: X-Blades is a third-person hack-and-slash action title featuring a scantily-clad heroine who uses her gunblades and spells to destroy everything in her path.
results.name: X-Blades

results.deck: Human Revolution is the third game in the Deus Ex series, a prequel where players take control of augmented security officer Adam Jensen, and investigate attacks against Sarif Industries, a leader in augmentation technology.
results.name: Deus Ex: Human Revolution

results.deck: NBA 2K6 is the seventh installment of the NBA 2K series of realistic basketball games, updating the roster to the 2005/2006 NBA season while adding new control mechanics.
results.name: NBA 2K6

results.deck: When King Jason's beloved Alceme is murdered at the altar on their wedding day, he embarks on a legendary journey with the greatest heroes of myth in order to find a way to bring her back to life, and get his revenge on the cultists who ordered her death.
results.name: Rise of the Argonauts

results.deck: Go head-to-head with the greatest PDC Champions.
results.name: PDC World Championship Darts 2008

results.deck: Madden NFL 08 is the 19th installment in the Madden franchise. While flaunting enhanced graphics, this version also introduced new animations, Hit Stick 2.0, and a player "weapon" mechanic to help distinguish the good from the great.
results.name: Madden NFL 08

results.deck: Dynasty Warriors meets Gundam in a spin-off of the Dynasty Warriors franchise. Dynasty Warriors: Gundam brings two popular franchises into one game with characters and mobile suits from series ranging from the original Mobile Suit Gundam to G Gundam.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors: Gundam

results.deck: Naruto: The Broken Bond is the sequel to the 2007 RPG/Fighter Rise of a Ninja and covers episodes 81-135 of the anime.  The game features a brand new teamwork system and a roster of 30 playable characters with an overhauled combat system and a new online ranking system.
results.name: Naruto: The Broken Bond

results.deck: NBA 2K8 continues a five year legacy as the #1 rated NBA simulation with in-game features that bring basketball to life like never before.
results.name: NBA 2K8

results.deck: Frontier Developments of Elite and LostWinds fame is developing this ambitious action/thriller promising to deliver a story directed by...you.
results.name: The Outsider

results.deck: L.A. Noire is a detective thriller developed by Team Bondi in Australia and published by Rockstar Games.
results.name: L.A. Noire

results.deck: The King of Fighters XII is the next installment of the popular team fighting franchise, featuring new high-resolution hand-drawn 2D sprites and backgrounds.
results.name: The King of Fighters XII

results.deck: Warhound puts you in the role of a freelance mercenary, whose job is to participate in armed conflicts and private wars around the world.
results.name: Warhound

results.deck: The year is 1916. Young American joins UK Army to experience an adventure of his life and soon realizes that greater evil is hiding beneath the Great War storm. He has to face the underground world of vampires, demons, evil genius creatures and even become one of the demons to rescue the human and vampire kind from forces of darkness.
results.name: NecroVisioN

results.deck: After a zombie virus sweeps across a beautiful island resort, survivors must fight their way to freedom while trying to find out exactly what went down in this open-world first-person action game.
results.name: Dead Island

results.deck: Beginning with the events of Marvel's Secret War and going into Civil War, players will take control of several Marvel characters in this follow up to the first Ultimate Alliance game.
results.name: Marvel Ultimate Alliance 2

results.deck: Phantom of Inferno is a visual novel game based on a group of assassins with one boy in particular. Taking the role of this boy, you follow him through a tale of murder, love, and revenge that spawned three separate releases.
results.name: Phantom of Inferno

results.deck: After a violent death by an unknown force and a timely reanimation by the human supremacist organization Cerberus, Commander Shepard must assemble a new squad in the seedier side of the galaxy for a suicide mission in the second installment of the "Mass Effect" trilogy.
results.name: Mass Effect 2

results.deck: "THE iDOLM@STER" is a Japanese rhythm and simulation game in which the player takes the role of a producer. Originally an arcade game, it was brought to the Xbox 360 in 2007.
results.name: THE iDOLM@STER

results.deck: Solve cases on the infamous Autobahn highway in this laughable title by taking down dangerous criminals without stepping out of your vehicle in over 70 fascinating missions. Also features a local multiplayer race mode.
results.name: Crash Time: Autobahn Pursuit

results.deck: The Saboteur is a action-packed, free-roaming sandbox game that takes place in Nazi-occupied France during World War II. Drive the Nazis out of Paris through whatever means necessary as Irish mechanic-turned-race-car-driver-turned-soldier-of-fortune Sean Devlin.
results.name: The Saboteur

results.deck: A minigame collection that puts more emphasis on the Rabbids, rather than Rayman himself.
results.name: Rayman: Raving Rabbids

results.deck: Wanted: Weapons of Fate is a follow-up to the 2008 film which was loosely based on a graphic novel.
results.name: Wanted: Weapons of Fate

results.deck: Designed both as a Blu-ray movie and a video game, WarDevil is a long-in-development action game built for next-generation systems.
results.name: WarDevil: Unleash the Beast Within

results.deck: Battlefield 2: Modern Combat brings the modern military Battlefield experience from the PC to sixth-generation consoles.
results.name: Battlefield 2: Modern Combat

results.deck: Portal 2 is the sequel to the acclaimed first-person puzzle game, carrying forward its love of mind-bending problems and its reckless disregard for the space-time continuum.
results.name: Portal 2

results.deck: Operation Flashpoint 2: Dragon Rising is a direct sequel to 2001's hit combat simulation game Operation Flashpoint: Cold War Crisis and the expansion pack Operation Flashpoint: Resistance.
results.name: Operation Flashpoint: Dragon Rising

results.deck: A mystery adventure game from Gabriel Knight creator, Jane Jensen.
results.name: Gray Matter

results.deck: NBA Live 08 is another yearly installment in EA's NBA Live series. The Washington Wizards' Gilbert Arenas is featured on the cover.
results.name: NBA Live 08

results.deck: NHL 2K7 was the seventh game in the series released on Xbox, Xbox360, PlayStation2, and PlayStation3.
results.name: NHL 2K7

results.deck: NCAA Football 2007 is the 10th game in the NCAA Football series. The theme for NCAA Football 2007 is "Turn the Tide." It features former USC Trojan and Heisman Winner Reggie Bush, who currently plays for the New Orleans Saints. This is the first next-generation NCAA Football game.
results.name: NCAA Football 07

results.deck: The famous Monopoly board game comes to the current generation of consoles featuring a variety of new features, including mini-games.
results.name: Monopoly: Here & Now Worldwide Edition

results.deck: Two Worlds: The Temptation was to be the sequel to Two Worlds, but has since been canceled and replaced with Two Worlds II, which uses an all-new engine.
results.name: Two Worlds: The Temptation

results.deck: BlazBlue is a 2D fighting game released by Arc System Works. With its high resolution sprites and 3D backgrounds, it is widely considered a spiritual sequel to Guilty Gear XX.
results.name: BlazBlue: Calamity Trigger

results.deck: A dungeon-based action RPG developed by Firefly Studios. With a main character looking like Kratos!?
results.name: Dungeon Hero

results.deck: The episodic game series based on The Watchmen graphic novel and film, featuring Nite Owl and Rorschach. Players brawl their way through six chapters that take place before the events of the film and graphic novel.
results.name: Watchmen: The End is Nigh

results.deck: Overlord is a comedic action-adventure game starring the titular Evil Overlord. After waking up with no memory, the Overlord is goaded into unleashing his minion army upon the world for its own good.
results.name: Overlord

results.deck: Elveon was meant to be an action-RPG that followed the saga of an experienced elf warrior as he attempts to liberate the city of Nimathar, but no word has been released on the game since 2008, so it can safely be assumed to be cancelled.
results.name: Elveon

results.deck: Shadow of Aten is an upcoming thriller game where you play as a ex British agent named Allan Scott as he investigates a murder of a famous British archaeologist in the year 1936.
results.name: Shadow Of Aten

results.deck: Scene It? Box Office Smash, a follow up to Scene It? Lights, Camera, Action, is a movie trivia game that allows up to four players to play, either locally or online.
results.name: Scene It? Box Office Smash

results.deck: NCAA Football 08 is the 11th installment of the franchise. This version sported a new engine and control scheme, allowing for a different gameplay experience than previous iterations.
results.name: NCAA Football 08

results.deck: Cipher Complex is a stealth action game coming to the Xbox 360 and the Playstation 3. It is being developed by Edge of Reality.
results.name: Cipher Complex

results.deck: Samurai Warriors 2 Empires is a more "strategic" version of Samurai Warriors 2.  Choose or create your character and lead them into historical battles from the Sengoku period of Japan.
results.name: Samurai Warriors 2: Empires

results.deck: Faith and a .45 was an action game being developed by independent developer Deadline Games. They planned to release it on Xbox 360 and Playstation 3, but it has since been cancelled.
results.name: Faith and a .45

results.deck: An homage to obscene grindhouse-style movies, WET is a third-person action/shooter soaked in blood and violence. Featuring the voice acting talent of Eliza Dushku & Alan Cumming.
results.name: WET

results.deck: Apocalypse: Desire Next is a strategy role-playing game created for XBOX 360 by Japanese developer Idea Factory.  Apocalypse: Desire Next has been released in Japan.  Currently no announcements have been made for other regions.
results.name: Apocalypse: Desire Next

results.deck: LMA Manager 2007 is the eighth game in the LMA Manager series. It was released on PlayStation 2, Xbox 360 and PC.
results.name: LMA Manager 2007

results.deck: A sci-fi FPS long in development. Released as a Steam Early Access game in July 2013, the full game is slated for release near the end of 2014.
results.name: Interstellar Marines

results.deck: A racing game for a variety of consoles based around the Hot Wheels franchise.
results.name: Hot Wheels: Beat That!

results.deck: Football Manager 2006 is the second game in the popular management franchise developed by Sports Interactive.
results.name: Worldwide Soccer Manager 2006

results.deck: For the 2008 edition of the 2K series, Jason Spezza of the Ottawa Senators was cover athlete.
results.name: NHL 2K8

results.deck: The 13th release in the franchise, Armored Core: for Answer is set ten years after Armored Core 4 and sees the largest machines in Armored Core yet called Arms Forts.
results.name: Armored Core: for Answer

results.deck: The official game of World Snooker for 2007 now includes World Pool Championships as well.
results.name: World Snooker Championship 2007

results.deck: Guilty Gear 2: Overture overthrows the 2D versus fighting of the Guilty Gear franchise's previous installments, throwing in a hybrid of 3D third-person hack-and-slash combat with troop management similar to Defense of the Ancients.
results.name: Guilty Gear 2: Overture

results.deck: Movie tie-in game released for numerous platforms in 2007. Basic 3-D adventure game.
results.name: Disney's Meet the Robinsons

results.deck: DDR Universe was the first DDR game made for the 7th generation of consoles and is an Xbox 360 exclusive. The European version known as 'Dancing Stage Universe' launched with 12 extra songs while omitting a few found in the U.S version.
results.name: Dance Dance Revolution UNIVERSE

results.deck: Mushihime-sama is a bullet hell shoot 'em up developed by Cave.
results.name: Mushihime-Sama

results.deck: Yet another DDR game. Need I say more?
results.name: Dance Dance Revolution UNIVERSE 2

results.deck: Return to the dark life of Jackie Estacado in The Darkness II, Digital Extremes' sequel to the 2007 shooter by Starbreeze.
results.name: The Darkness II

results.deck: 2 Days to Vegas is an action game being developed by Steel Monkeys for Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 and PC.
results.name: 2 Days to Vegas

results.deck: A direct sequel to the first Avatar game, The Burning Earth takes place during the second book of the Avatar series. The game has gained notoriety for having the easiest achievements on the XBOX 360.
results.name: Avatar: The Last Airbender - The Burning Earth

results.deck: A Japanese wrestling game that was created by the makers of the Gamecube WWE Day of Reckoning series.  This game features freelance wrestlers and also includes top stars from the biggest promotions in Japan.
results.name: Wrestle Kingdom

results.deck: Based on the Movie and Book. The story of the young farm boy named Eragon who stumbles upon a dragon egg, leading to adventure.
results.name: Eragon

results.deck: 2K Sports 2006 edition of the MLB 2K series. It is also the first baseball game of the "next gen" era.
results.name: Major League Baseball 2K6

results.deck: Guitar Hero: Metallica is the second band-specific game in the Guitar Hero franchise. It features 28 songs from the world famous heavy-metal band Metallica, as well as 21 guest acts - picked by Metallica themselves.
results.name: Guitar Hero: Metallica

results.deck: World Championship Poker: All In (Ft. Howard Lederer) is the third installment in the World Championship Poker series.
results.name: World Championship Poker Featuring Howard Lederer ALL IN

results.deck: College Hoops 2K7 was the 5th installation of 2K Sports' popular College Hoops line of College Basketball Games.
results.name: College Hoops 2K7

results.deck: The popular hunting game returns for the 08 season featuring updated online tournaments.
results.name: Deer Hunter Tournament

results.deck: Summer Athletics is a track and field video game released during the hype of the 2008 Beijing Olympics. The game features over two dozen events and a career mode, and supports up to four players.
results.name: Summer Athletics

results.deck: SCORE International Baja 1000 is an offroad racing game featuring over 90 vehicles and multiple classes including trophy trucks, class I, motorcycles, and ATVs.
results.name: SCORE International Baja 1000

results.deck:
This is a fishing game
It is a part of the RAPALA Franchise
results.name: Rapala Tournament Fishing

results.deck: Race Pro provides a realistic approach to sports car racing on the Xbox 360.
results.name: RACE Pro

results.deck: MotoGP 08 features high-speed motorcycle racing with famous riders and top bike manufacturers, and promises to be more accessible than ever to beginners.
results.name: MotoGP 08

results.deck: A less than mediocre hunting simulator
results.name: Cabela's Alaskan Adventures

results.deck: Galactic Command - Excalibur is a space combat sim.
results.name: Galactic Command - Excalibur

results.deck: A combination of real-time strategy and first-person shooting, Raven Squad puts players in control of two groups of mercenaries who crash land behind enemy lines in the Amazonian jungles.
results.name: Raven Squad: Operation Hidden Dagger

results.deck: The tie-in game of the film of the same title. Return to Hogwarts to help Harry survive a fraught sixth year in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince.
results.name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

results.deck: Battle Fantasia is a 2D fighting game with fantasy RPG aesthetics developed by Arc System Works for the PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and arcades.
results.name: Battle Fantasia
